intro: Ready to revamp your style and bring out the best version of yourself? This is the perfect game to explore and have fun while doing it!
description:
Dare to find your own style! This interactive game will guide you in a practical and fun way through the universe of fashion, showing you which clothes really suit you according to your body, how to get the colors right and how to put together a closet full of key pieces that speak of your style and personality.

Key features:

-Identify your body type: learn how to bring out the best in you. Discover which styles and cuts are ideal for you and how to get the most out of them.
-Select clothes that flatter you: from dresses to jackets, learn how to choose pieces that make you feel comfortable and confident, while enhancing your figure.
-Explore color palettes: create color combinations that suit your skin tone and style. Learn to wear shades that flatter any occasion.
-Accessories that make a difference: become a master of details and discover how the right accessories can transform your look.
Discover essentials: build a timeless closet with key must-haves in your collection, from the classic black dress to the perfect pair of jeans.
Constant experimentation: Try different looks and styles while having fun - each decision will bring you closer to defining your personal style!

In addition to improving your style, this game will help you increase your confidence and creativity. With a mix of learning and entertainment, it will guide you to dress in a way that reflects the real you. 

Ready to revamp your style and bring out the best version of yourself? This is the perfect game to explore, learn and have fun while doing it!
